settings.import.file.subtitle: (up to 10MB) See below for supported formats
settings.import.export.title: Export Data
settings.import.supported.title: Supported formats for importing
settings.import.supported.body:
• YouTube takeouts (.zip)
  • Invidious XML/OPML exports (.xml)
  • Invidious JSON exports (.json)
  • Piped playlists (.json)
  • Piped subscriptions (.json)
  • LightTube exports (.json)
settings.import.supported.more: If you need support for other websites/apps, please open an issue on GitHub
subscription.edit.title: Manage Subscription
subscription.edit.body: Edit your subscription settings with this channel.
subscription.state.1.detailed: Just subscribe (won't include videos from this channel in your RSS feed)
subscription.state.2.detailed: Subscribe and include in the RSS feed

error.title: Whoops!
error.body.innertube: This problem was caused while interacting with YouTube. If you want to report it, head over to InnerTube GitHub issues page and open an issue with the following information:
error.body.lighttube: To report this error, head over to LightTube GitHub issues page and open an issue with the following information:
error.body.details.instance: LightTube instance this error occured on
error.alternatives: You can still try one of these alternatives to access this resource:
error.register.password.length: Password must be longer than 8 characters
error.delete.consent: Please check the checkbox to delete your account
error.oauth2.disabled: This instance does not allow OAuth2
error.player.agerestricted: Please contact the instance administrator to include InnerTube login details
error.player.contentcheck: I understand and wish to proceed
error.player.useother: This might not occur in other instances. Find them here
error.player.nomuxed: No muxed formats were returned from YouTube
error.player.javascript: This video requires JavaScript to play correctly
